channel.title: Ugh wth.. help please?
channel.description: ok, i used to host my server all the time and yes, i have my port forwarded and it is open. also no-ip DNS is up and running fine.. but i can't connect to my own server when it's online anymore? rofl.. this is what every server runner spams when i try to log in on it: [code]Connection from James-PC:51793 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:4996) at client.run(client.java:14339) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (James-PC)[/code] (btw my comp's name is JAMES-PC) this might be the problem, since i stopped hosting a server, i've got a new laptop with windows7 (previously had XP) also i port forward via utorrent if that helps at all (used to on other comp to though and worked fine..?) any help is much appreciated! ty :)

item.title: Ugh wth.. help please?
item.dc:creator: @singed singed
item.description:
@singed wrote:

dude wtf? then that will switch me to localhost… and no one else would be able to connect then

Read full topic

item.title: Ugh wth.. help please?
item.dc:creator: @HotDogs1 HotDogs1
item.description:
@HotDogs1 wrote:

Yes It Lookes Like Your Trying To Connect Using Your Ip- It Should Say Connection From 127.0.0.1 Instead of james pc, Just Simply switch ip To 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: Ugh wth.. help please?
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Just type in the ip as 0.0.0.0
if that doesnt work try
127.0.0.1
tell me if you can connect.

Read full topic

item.title: Ugh wth.. help please?

@singed wrote:

it’s running via port 43594 though? >_>

item.title: Ugh wth.. help please?
item.dc:creator: @Aintaro Aintaro
item.description:
@Aintaro wrote:

[quote=“singed, post:3, topic:373497”]dude it’s not?
everyone else can connect to my server just not me lmfao.[/quote]

Thats because their not using the port 43594 or 5555 AKA default ports.

Read full topic

item.title: Ugh wth.. help please?
item.dc:creator: @Aintaro Aintaro
item.description:
@Aintaro wrote:

[quote=“singed, post:1, topic:373497”]ok, i used to host my server all the time and yes, i have my port forwarded and it is open. also no-ip DNS is up and running fine…
but i can’t connect to my own server when it’s online anymore? rofl… this is what every server runner spams when i try to log in on it:

Connection from James-PC:51793 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:4996) at client.run(client.java:14339) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (James-PC)
(btw my comp’s name is JAMES-PC)
this might be the problem, since i stopped hosting a server, i’ve got a new laptop with windows7 (previously had XP)
also i port forward via utorrent if that helps at all (used to on other comp to though and worked fine…?) any help is much appreciated! ty :)[/quote]

Most likely your port is already in Use by somthing else (mabye torrent) So thats why you can’t connect.

Read full topic
